N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 352.3 - Tests

State Regulations
(a) An official
sample shall be taken by a veterinarian of at least four horses chosen by lot
in every weight class. Each horse entering each weight class shall be
identified by number. Numbers shall be drawn by lot until at least four horses
are designated for official sampling. (b) The veterinarian or any judge may also
require that an official sample be taken of any horse not included in the
selection specified in subdivision (a) of this section, if in his or her
opinion such a sample is necessary to assure the integrity of the testing
program. (c) Each official sample
shall be submitted by the veterinarian to a laboratory for a test. Test results
disclosing the presence of drugs shall be forwarded to the director who shall
notify the fair concerned and shall give written notice thereof by regular
mail, personal service or certified mail to the owner and the person having
care, custody or control of the horse. Notes
